scripts.install:all: yarn install && cd ./server && yarn install && cd ../control-panel-ui && yarn install && cd ../mtek-ui && yarn install
scripts.dev: concurrently -p '[{name}]' -c 'bgGreen,bgCyan,bgMagenta' -n 'server,control-panel-ui,mtek-ui' 'cd ./server && yarn start:dev' 'cd ./control-panel-ui && yarn dev' 'cd ./mtek-ui && yarn dev'
